title: George Floyd protests: Misleading footage and conspiracy theories spread online
subtitle: Protests after the death of George Floyd have led to a surge in misleading videos and unfounded theories.
author: www.bbc.co.uk
vclaim: A post claiming the man in the video is an "FBI agent" has been viewed over 4 million times on Twitter. This claim was repeated on Facebook and Instagram by others sharing the video, where it racked up millions more views.
